titleStmt.title: Joseph Fox et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG5414

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
To His Excellency. Thos E Bramlette
Govenor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

The undersigned citizens of Muhlenberg and Ohio counties and acquaintance of Mrs. Wm Kirly Represent that at the late Novr term of the Muhlenberg Circuit Court the said Wm Kirtly was tried upon an indictment for grand Larceny, convicted and sentenced to two years confinement in the penitentiary A certifed Copy of the evidence upon which he was convicted will be herewith presented Those of us that heard the proof did not think it warranted a conviction and such We believe was the conviction of nearly every unbiased man that heard it.
We ask Your Excellency to to examine the evidence and to interpose Executive Clemency in behalf of Mr. Kirtly

Joseph Fox
J J Coffman Jr
Jesse Wallace
Josiah Gish
Henry King
R M Crumb
H. T. Buckley
Fayatte Ford
Charles Lelz
Jarrad Wallace
W. E. Hughes
